scripts.build: npm run wrap && npm run wrap:min
scripts.build:app: npm run build:app:js && npm run build:app:js:min && npm run build:app:css
scripts.build:app:js: browserify --bare -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] demo/app.js -o dist/demo-bundle.js 2>&1 | wooster
scripts.watch:app: miru -t dist/wrapper.js -t index.html -w [npm run watch:app:js, dist/demo-bundle.js] -w [npm run watch:app:css, dist/demo-bundle.css]
scripts.wrap: webwrap -v -f umd -n asap -x createAsapPlayer vendor/XAudioJS/XAudioServer.js vendor/XAudioJS/resampler.js vendor/XAudioJS/swfobject.js src/asap/asap.js src/asap/asap_player.js -o dist/wrapper.js
scripts.wrapl: ../webwrap/cli.js -v -f umd -n asap -x createAsapPlayer vendor/XAudioJS/XAudioServer.js vendor/XAudioJS/resampler.js vendor/XAudioJS/swfobject.js src/asap/asap.js src/asap/asap_player.js -o dist/wrapper.js
